Description: This is a great guitar that is in perfect working condition, and only has a couple cosmetic flaws. I can throw in the stand for free if you want it. Manufacturer Description: Storm the stage with lightning graphics and raging tone. The Black Bolt ML is an electric guitar that has a mahogany body, maple neck, and a fast rosewood fretboard. The Dean ML body design spreads the mass of the body over a larger area to provide the ultimate sustain and tone. The guitar's fixed bridge with string-thru-body design adds even more sustain. The distinctive headstock creates an extra long string length for a sound like no other. The DimeBolt guitar has a Dean dual blade humbucker pickup in the bridge position and a classic humbucker at the neck position to give you the full range of tones you need. The Dimebolt guitar's custom lightning bolt graphics really stand out on stage and its black hardware adds to the dark vibe of this beast. Dime traction knobs let you easily stay in control of your Dimebolt From Hell. FEATURES Mahogany Body Bolt-on Maple Neck Rosewood Fingerboard 22 Frets Custom Lightning Bolt Graphics Bolt-on Construction String Through Body Tailpiece Dual Blade Bridge Pickup Classic Humbucker Neck Pickup Dime Traction knobs Black Hardware
Title: Dean Dimebag Bbolt ML Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: Overall very good condition. There are only a few minor dings and scuffs, all of which are shown in the photos.
